app_detail:
ALL Video Downloader
Pop-up Video Player
Background Play
Equalizer & Subtitle

With HD Video Player, you can enjoy fast & stable 4K playback with equalizer & subtitle. It is also a video downloader, which helps you get online hot videos with flash speed. And you can even hide your personal videos in the private folder safely with this powerful video player.

Letâ€˜s download some interesting movies and enjoy them in high quality NOW!

ğŸ¥‡TOP FEATURES
â— Play HD, Full HD, 1080P, 4K & Ultra 4K videos
â— Support ALL Video Formats including: MKV, MP4, M4V, MOV, 3GP, FLV, F4V, WEBM, etc.
â— Subtitle & Equalizer supported
â— Background Play for playing video like music
â— Play in Pop-up Window
â— NO.1 hd video player with Video Downloader
â— Automatically detect videos in the phone storage or SD Card
â— A-B Repeat & loop mode
â— Screen Locker prevent misuse when the video is playing
â— Sleep timer
â— Smart gesture operation
â— Night mode and multi themes
â— HD Video Player for both Android Phone and Tablet

All Video Downloader
Download HD videos at a lightning speed. This All Video Downloader supports downloading multiple files meanwhile on the background. 

Equalizer & Subtitle
HD Video Player with equalizer & subtitle also helps you to make your playback even cool. And all kinds of surround sound effect make you feel like being in the movie theater.

Pop-up & Background Video Player
Enjoy video in the background just like a music playback to save battery. Watch video in pop-up window, split screen for convenient multitasking.

HD Video Player with Private Folder
This fantastic video player also supports saving your personal videos & movies in a password-protected folder. 

HD Video Player all format is a totally FREE video player for android and a true All-in-one video player. We are open to any suggestions for better user experience. Please feel free to contact us at hdvideoplayer.feedback@gmail.com
